Params: Up to 90 percent of the action module is damaged...
Just leave me here... Go and meet up with your team!
No! I won't leave you here!
...As long as the Inver-Device is not damaged, I will be fine.
I can fix my frame through recycling adjustments, then... restart.
If you're going to restart yourself, everything that we experienced together will mean nothing!
We'll both be surrounded by the Corrupted if you don't go... Listen to me! You gotta go!
No, I won't leave you here no matter what you say.
This is Kamui, this is Kamui, Kamui of First Team. Lucia? Watanabe? We need support, we need support, the coordinates are...
Go away...! Get off from me!
Take my hand! I-I'll protect you!
Wave after wave of Corrupted flocked toward the struggling Koya.
Black smoke engulfed him right away.
Koya reached out to Kamui with all his might.
The pain of being torn apart can be felt in his cries of terror and despair.
In the end, Kamui could never grab Koya's hand.
Ah, shut up, you bunch of trash.
My body can never be hurt.
By a bunch of trash like you.
